actor

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • actor.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player, Projectile, Wall

    public abstract class Actor
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Actor()
      Initialize actor with default values
      Actor(int hp, int x, int y, int vx, int vy)
      Initialize actor with parameter values

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act()
      indicates action of the actor in 1 frame
      void bounce()
      bounces off object when hit
      void bounceOffWindow()
      bounces off window when hit to prevent getting out of the grid
      boolean intersects()
      find whether or not the actor intersects with others

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Initialize actor with default values

      • Actor

        public Actor(int hp,
             int x,
             int y,
             int vx,
             int vy)
        Initialize actor with parameter values
        Parameters:
        hp - Hitpoint
        x - x-coordinate
        y - y-coordinate
        vx - velocity in x axis
        vy - velocity in y axis

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        indicates action of the actor in 1 frame

      • bounce

        public void bounce()
        bounces off object when hit

      • bounceOffWindow

        public void bounceOffWindow()
        bounces off window when hit to prevent getting out of the grid

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects()
        find whether or not the actor intersects with others
        Returns:
        true if intersects with other actors, reactables, or projectiles, false if not
